title: Find Ketheric Thorm's Relic
content:
Find Ketheric Thorm's Relic Walkthrough

You need to reach the Gauntlet of Shar from the Grand Mausoleum (Thorm Mausoleum). In order to reveal the passage, you need to press the buttons under the 3 paintings in the following order: Moonrise Towers, Grief, General. (You can find the clue in a book in that region.) You can acquire this quest in Gauntlet of Shar. In the initial chamber of Gauntlet of Shar, there is a small statue holding an orb. You'll get pushed back if you attempt to approach it
